fields.fieldDescription: The Record ID (RID) that uniquely identifies this standalone outstanding wrapper.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
Timestamp from when this row was created.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
The Record ID (RID) of the associated outstanding.
The Record ID (RID) of the Product Template from which the standalone outstanding was created.
Indicates the drawdown represents an offer to the borrower.
Indicates whether, when IMT cashflows are released, the funds are to be credited on the same day or the next day.
Indicates whether the outstanding is eligible for securitization.
Indicates that the lender has requested early termination.
Indicates that the borrower has requested early termination.
The alias of the original outstanding in the path of renewals leading to the current outstanding
The securitization measure (method) used internally by the client when the outstanding is securitized .
4 digit key for internal use of client
